title: Neocutis Lumiere Bio-restorative Eye Cream with PSP, Anti-aging, 0.5 Ounce
description: This gentle eye cream works to reduce the appearance of dark circles and puffiness with caffeine, bisabolol and sodium hyaluronate, in combination with the effective complex, psp. psp, or processed skin proteins, is a naturally balanced blend of essential nutrients, such as growth factors, antioxidants and matrix proteins, including collagen. this powerful ingredient revives skin, causing it to become softer, firmer, younger- and healthier-looking. fragrance- and colorant-free, lumiere bio-restorative eye cream with psp is ultra-gentle for the delicate eye area. the skin around the eyes is left softer, stronger and younger-looking.

title: Hydrating with Peptides - A Renewal Complex - 1oz/30ml - A Professionally Formulated Combination of Unique Patented Peptides ArgirelineTM, Matrixyl® 3000, and Syn®-coll, Synergistically Work to Reduce Fine Lines and Wrinkles
description:
Excel-Skin Care's Hydra-Pep Lifting Serum is a remarkable advanced peptide serum which utilizes proven ingredient technology to diminish visible lines and wrinkles to give your skin an immediate firming and lifting effect. MatrixylTM 3000, a dual patented peptide has been clinically proven through a panel of participants to significantly reduce the depth of wrinkle volume by an average of 45%, and by increasing the spread angle between wrinkles, resulting in a decrease in the appearance of facial wrinkles. Also includes additional peptides which have been clinically tested and proven to ease variations of wrinkle depth, while smoothing and relaxing wrinkles, expression, and facial lines. 

This cutting-edge formulation at a measurable and tested ingredient concentration of actives will firm, lift, tone, and tighten areas of skin. Infused with hyaluronic acid which hydrates, while peptides simultaneously function to relax visible facial lines and reduce wrinkle depth associated with premature aging. Your skin will become noticeably smoother, tighter, more firm, with a significantly lesser amount of wrinkles and lines.
